title: How to Dress Modestly and Attractively (Girls)

steps.title: Make your outfit extra cute with a cardigan.
steps.content: Make your outfit extra cute with a cardigan. Cardigans are great for any kind of season and setting, and you can wear them over dresses, skirts, and pants⁠—whatever suits you! They also come in a variety of colors, lengths, and materials, making them super easy to customize for your outfit. [1] X Research source A thigh or knee-length chunky cardigan can keep you warm in the winter⁠, and a short-sleeve cardigan over a floral skirt could be perfect for spring. You could layer a black cardigan over a dress for a formal event, or choose a fun, colorful patterned cardigan to wear with your favorite jeans. Outerwear is versatile in general for layering, covering up, and making your outfit more chic, so stock up on cute pieces⁠ like shawls, leather jackets, sweaters, blazers, and more⁠!

steps.title: Midi and maxi skirts and dresses are super stylish and elegant.
steps.content: Midi and maxi skirts and dresses are super stylish and elegant. If you don’t want to show too much of your legs, shopping by hem length and choosing longer styles is a great way to achieve the look you want and be fashionable at the same time. You can easily dress them up or down and choose the right materials for different seasons. [2] X Research source For instance, you could dress down your skirt by wearing a graphic tee as a top.

steps.title: The A-line cut is universally flattering.
steps.content: The A-line cut is universally flattering. It brings your waist out and then flares out, giving you a feminine shape. They’re not super difficult to find, so you can easily customize and keep it modest while still looking great and elegant in this silhouette. [3] X Research source For instance, you could pick out an A-line dress with a floral pattern and long sleeves. You could also cinch in your waist with a chic belt.

steps.title: Leggings help you cover up and add extra style to an outfit.
steps.content: Leggings help you cover up and add extra style to an outfit. If your legs are cold or you don’t want to show skin while wearing a skirt or dress, leggings provide the perfect way to stay while giving you another route to bring out your personal style with colors and patterns. They can go with pretty much any length or style of skirt! Avoid wearing leggings alone, as this can be seen as too tight and immodest. Tights or pantyhose definitely work for leg coverage, too, but they can be uncomfortable or made of sheer material.

steps.title: Turtlenecks are instant style boosts.
steps.content: Turtlenecks are instant style boosts. Elegant and versatile, turtlenecks keep you warm and covered in colder weather⁠, and are also super comfortable. You don’t have to create an elaborate outfit⁠—just pair them with jeans or a skirt or even overalls to create a simple but chic ensemble. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Make a top more modest by layering a camisole or tank top underneath!
steps.content: Make a top more modest by layering a camisole or tank top underneath! There’s no need to fear V-necks or other low-cut necklines if you really love a piece, since adding an undershirt layer can help cover cleavage and hide other revealing areas. You can choose tank tops with colors or patterns for an extra style boost. A camisole with feminine lace detailing at the neck can easily add elegance to your look.

steps.title: You can easily mix up a basic t-shirt or long sleeve with a fashionable sleeve.
steps.content: You can easily mix up a basic t-shirt or long sleeve with a fashionable sleeve. Choosing a fashion-forward sleeve is a great way to stay modest and covered up while also looking trendy: many sleeve styles provide skin coverage and add flair at the same time; for instance, look for short-sleeve tops with cap or puff sleeves, or long-sleeve tops with kimono, lantern, or bell sleeves. Different sleeve styles cover different amounts of your arm, so you can choose the styles that suit you best!

steps.title: Stick with classy shoes over sexy ones!
steps.content: Stick with classy shoes over sexy ones! Mind your heel height; thin, extremely high heels can be associated with sexiness, so consider varieties like kitten heels or low heel pumps to keep up a modest appearance. If you want to go more casual, a cute pair of sneakers or boots can also be a stylish and versatile addition to your outfit. [5] X Research source For instance, you could wear chunky white sneakers with a maxi skirt.

steps.title: Scarves can add an extra boost of style.
steps.content: Scarves can add an extra boost of style. They come in a variety of colors, patterns, and looks, meaning that you can customize the look however you want. They also have the added benefit of covering more skin at the base of your neck and top of your chest. If you have a larger bust, scarves can cover revealing areas and allow you to wear more pieces. You can wear scarves year-round⁠—just pick out lighter materials in hotter weather.

steps.title: A fashionable hat instantly brings flair to your outfit.
steps.content: A fashionable hat instantly brings flair to your outfit. Pick from a broad range of fashionable styles, from sun hats to berets to bucket hats, and more! Look for one that suits the shape of your face and your personal taste. [6] X Research source Try on a cute, floppy straw sun hat in the summer, or a cozy, colorful beanie in the fall!

steps.title: This is an easy way to make your look even cuter!
steps.content: This is an easy way to make your look even cuter! Your options range from headbands to clips to pins to scrunchies. There are tons of styles to pick from, too⁠—you could go more classic with something pearl-studded, or pick out a chunky statement piece.

steps.title: You’ll look put together and stylish.
steps.content: You’ll look put together and stylish. Sunglasses can do a great job elevating your outfit and they only take a second to throw on. They come in lots of styles⁠, like aviators or cat-eyes⁠⁠—so pick out a pair that matches your top or dress, or find a staple that works for pretty much any look!

steps.title: The right jewelry can really accent your look.
steps.content: The right jewelry can really accent your look. Try wearing pieces that will match your wardrobe best⁠—for instance, bring in a bright yellow or red if your clothes tend to be dark and muted⁠—or pick out a versatile silver or gold necklace that goes with many of your cardigans and dresses. [7] X Research source If you want to keep your jewelry understated or you’re not sure where to start, try wearing one key piece at a time first and seeing how it looks before adding on more. In time, you can work up to coordinating multiple pieces at once! You could opt for a more fun and colorful look, like wearing colorful bracelets and chunky earrings. Or you could try an elegant look with a classic pearl necklace and delicate gold studs.

steps.title: Handbags can be the perfect finishing touch for your outfit.
steps.content: Handbags can be the perfect finishing touch for your outfit. You can go with something classic and versatile, like a leather bag in a neutral color, or mix things up with a large shoulder bag or patterned clutch. [8] X Research source Try out different styles⁠—maybe you’ll like a clutch or tote bag best, or even a mini backpack!
